logic.differentPlayerTypes

Class HumanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.playerState.Player
      • logic.differentPlayerTypes.HumanPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class HumanPlayer
extends Player
    Class that holds the board / gamestats for the human player. Doesn't actually call any functions, but human player must have the same supertype as the Bots to make it possible for the human player to select a domino from the bank as well as to be in the same array as the AI.
